data.title: Login to your HP Account
data.meta_description: Use the same HP login to access all your HP Support accounts & services. Learn about the benefits of creating an account & sign in to your HP account today.
data.text:
Locate all of your information in one place

Setup your personalized My Dashboard account on support.hp.com and register your products with HP quickly and easily! My Dashboard connects you to the HP Customer Support options available for your products. Other benefits include: specific information for your product, warranty status, software and drivers, troubleshooting, and more.

Receive support specific to your product and find the quickest path to your contact options

By creating your account, you have easy access to troubleshooting diagnostics, videos and helpful documents about your specific product.

Warranty information and other specifications are always available allowing you to receive contact options when needed!

Access your account from anywhere

Sign in from any device, even from your phone or our on-product application, HP Support Assistant.

With our apps you can get additional health status and keep your device up-to-date and running great with our helpful diagnostic tools.

VIDEO

New Personalized Support Dashboard Experience from HP Support

Welcome to a new personalized support dashboard experience from HP support. Learn how to create a new account and get your first device added to My Dashboard.

For more help on creating a new account, go here

One account, many uses!

Access your HP account to learn about HP applications and services.

HP's Support Community - Use your HP account to join the conversation to find solutions, ask questions, and share tips for HP Notebooks, Printers, Desktops, tablets, more. Get answers from HP experts and real HP employees, or offer guidance to someone else!

HP Instant Ink - Account status, account information, ink levels, print history, account history, and help information.

HP Store - Order history, account information, address book and more.

HP Smart - Print right from your phone, effortlessly order ink and more with your HP Smart account.

And much more!
